segments.text: I see the line drawing of this kitchen scene clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water overflows from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to receive one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slippery floor worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR
